g++  -g -DBASE_STD_STRING -DCHECK_PTHREAD_RETURN_VALUE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -rdynamic -Wno-unused-variable -O0   CMakeFiles/thread_test.dir/thread_test.cc.o  -o ../../bin/thread_test ../../lib/libbase.a -lpthread -lrt
